appLauncher.description: Title of the application launcher in the browser.

appDesc.message: Web content scraping with tagging support

addTagHelp.message: Tags should have a minimum length of 2 characters and should not contain special characters such as spaces, #, / ,\ and other. Multiple tags should be separated with comma.

saveScreenshotTitle.message: Take a screenshot of the visible page area as PNG

saveAsMhtmlTitle.message: Save complete page (including images) as MHTML, preserving the original design

savePageAsHtmlTitle.message: Save complete page (including images) as HTML, the original design will not be preserved

saveBookmarkTitle.message: Save a bookmark of the current page as Windows url file.

saveSelectionAsHtmlTitle.message: Save selected content (including images) as HTML
